description: The physical E-Stop button at Station 1 was pressed. All operations have been halted immediately to ensure personnel safety.
recommended_action: Check Station 1 for safety hazards. Reset E-Stop button physically before restarting system.

description: Motor Unit 3 is reading a temperature of 85°C, which exceeds the warning threshold of 80°C.
recommended_action: Inspect Motor Unit 3 cooling fans. Reduce conveyor load if necessary.

description: Photo-eye sensor #4 is detecting intermittent signal loss, suggesting it may have been bumped or blocked.
recommended_action: Clean sensor lens and realign Photo-eye #4.
